verses.verse: הֹד֣וּ <WH3034> O give thanks לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto the LORD כִּי־ <WH3588> for ט֑וֹב <WH2896> for [he is] good כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <WH2617> for his mercy

יֹ֭אמְרוּ <WH559> say גְּאוּלֵ֣י <WH1350> Let the redeemed יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> Whom גְּ֝אָלָ֗ם <WH1350> [so] whom he hath redeemed מִיַּד־ <WH3027> from the hand צָֽר׃ <WH6862> of the enemy

וּֽמֵאֲרָצ֗וֹת <WH776> them out of the lands קִ֫בְּצָ֥ם <WH6908> And gathered מִמִּזְרָ֥ח <WH4217> from the east וּמִֽמַּעֲרָ֑ב <WH4628> and from the west מִצָּפ֥וֹן <WH6828> from the north וּמִיָּֽם׃ <WH3220> and from the south

תָּע֣וּ <WH8582> They wandered בַ֭מִּדְבָּר <WH4057> in the wilderness בִּישִׁימ֣וֹן <WH3452> in a solitary דָּ֑רֶךְ <WH1870> way עִ֥יר <WH5892> no city מ֝וֹשָׁ֗ב <WH4186> to dwell לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not מָצָֽאוּ׃ <WH4672> they found
רְעֵבִ֥ים <WH7457> Hungry גַּם־ <WH1571> again צְמֵאִ֑ים <WH6771> and thirsty נַ֝פְשָׁ֗ם <WH5315> their soul בָּהֶ֥ם תִּתְעַטָּֽף׃ <WH5848> fainted

וַיִּצְעֲק֣וּ <WH6817> Then they cried אֶל־ <WH413> about יְ֭הוָה <WH3069> God בַּצַּ֣ר <WH6862> in their trouble לָהֶ֑ם <WH1992> out מִ֝מְּצֽוּקוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <WH4691> them out of their distresses יַצִּילֵֽם׃ <WH5337> [and] he delivered

וַ֭יַּֽדְרִיכֵם <WH1869> And he led them forth בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> way יְשָׁרָ֑ה <WH3477> by the right לָ֝לֶ֗כֶת <WH1980> to go אֶל־ <WH413> about עִ֥יר <WH5892> to a city מוֹשָֽׁב׃ <WH4186> of habitation

יוֹד֣וּ <WH3034> Oh that [men] would praise לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD חַסְדּ֑וֹ <WH2617> [for] his goodness וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו <WH6381> and [for] his wonderful works לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> to the children אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> of men

כִּי־ <WH3588> for הִ֭שְׂבִּיעַ <WH7646> For he satisfieth נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> soul שֹׁקֵקָ֑ה <WH8264> the longing וְנֶ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> soul רְ֝עֵבָה <WH7457> the hungry מִלֵּא־ <WH4390> and filleth טֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> with goodness

יֹ֭שְׁבֵי <WH3427> Such as sit חֹ֣שֶׁךְ <WH2822> in darkness וְצַלְמָ֑וֶת <WH6757> and in the shadow of death אֲסִירֵ֖י <WH615> [being] bound עֳנִ֣י <WH6040> in affliction וּבַרְזֶֽל׃ <WH1270> and iron

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because הִמְר֥וּ <WH4784> Because they rebelled אִמְרֵי־ <WH561> against the words אֵ֑ל <WH410> of God וַעֲצַ֖ת <WH6098> the counsel עֶלְי֣וֹן <WH5945> of the most High נָאָֽצוּ׃ <WH5006> and contemned

וַיַּכְנַ֣ע <WH3665> Therefore he brought down בֶּעָמָ֣ל <WH5999> with labour לִבָּ֑ם <WH3820> their heart כָּ֝שְׁל֗וּ <WH3782> they fell down וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> and there עֹזֵֽר׃ <WH5826> and [there was] none to help

וַיִּזְעֲק֣וּ <WH2199> Then they cried אֶל־ <WH413> about יְ֭הוָה <WH3069> God בַּצַּ֣ר <WH6862> in their trouble לָהֶ֑ם <WH1992> out מִ֝מְּצֻֽקוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <WH4691> them out of their distresses יוֹשִׁיעֵֽם׃ <WH3467> [and] he saved
יֽ֭וֹצִיאֵם <WH3318> He brought them out מֵחֹ֣שֶׁךְ <WH2822> of darkness וְצַלְמָ֑וֶת <WH6757> and the shadow of death וּמוֹסְר֖וֹתֵיהֶ֣ם <WH4147> their bands יְנַתֵּֽק׃ <WH5423> in sunder

יוֹד֣וּ <WH3034> Oh that [men] would praise לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD חַסְדּ֑וֹ <WH2617> [for] his goodness וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו <WH6381> and [for] his wonderful works לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> to the children אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> of men

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שִׁ֭בַּר <WH7665> For he hath broken דַּלְת֣וֹת <WH1817> the gates נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <WH5178> of brass וּבְרִיחֵ֖י <WH1280> the bars בַרְזֶ֣ל <WH1270> of iron גִּדֵּֽעַ׃ <WH1438> in sunder
אֱ֭וִלִים <WH191> Fools מִדֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> because פִּשְׁעָ֑ם <WH6588> of their transgression וּֽ֝מֵעֲוֹֽנֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <WH5771> and because of their iniquities יִתְעַנּֽוּ׃ <WH6031> are afflicted

כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֹ֭כֶל <WH400> all manner of meat תְּתַעֵ֣ב <WH8581> abhorreth נַפְשָׁ֑ם <WH5315> Their soul וַ֝יַּגִּ֗יעוּ <WH5060> and they draw near עַד־ <WH5704> against שַׁ֥עֲרֵי <WH8179> unto the gates מָֽוֶת׃ <WH4194> of death

וַיִּזְעֲק֣וּ <WH2199> Then they cry אֶל־ <WH413> about יְ֭הוָה <WH3069> God בַּצַּ֣ר <WH6862> in their trouble לָהֶ֑ם <WH1992> out מִ֝מְּצֻֽקוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <WH4691> them out of their distresses יוֹשִׁיעֵֽם׃ <WH3467> [and] he saveth
יִשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> He sent דְּ֭בָרוֹ <WH1697> his word וְיִרְפָּאֵ֑ם <WH7495> and healed וִֽ֝ימַלֵּ֗ט <WH4422> them and delivered מִשְּׁחִיתוֹתָֽם׃ <WH7825> [them] from their destructions ׆

יוֹד֣וּ <WH3034> Oh that [men] would praise לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD חַסְדּ֑וֹ <WH2617> [for] his goodness וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו <WH6381> and [for] his wonderful works לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> to the children אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> of men ׆

וְ֭יִזְבְּחוּ <WH2076> And let them sacrifice זִבְחֵ֣י <WH2077> the sacrifices תוֹדָ֑ה <WH8426> of thanksgiving וִֽיסַפְּר֖וּ <WH5608> and declare מַעֲשָׂ֣יו <WH4639> his works בְּרִנָּֽה׃ <WH7440> with rejoicing ׆

יוֹרְדֵ֣י <WH3381> They that go down הַ֭יָּם <WH3220> to the sea בָּאֳנִיּ֑וֹת <WH591> in ships עֹשֵׂ֥י <WH6213> that do מְ֝לָאכָ֗ה <WH4399> business בְּמַ֣יִם <WH4325> waters רַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> in great ׆
הֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> They רָ֭אוּ <WH7200> These see מַעֲשֵׂ֣י <WH4639> the works יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו <WH6381> and his wonders בִּמְצוּלָֽה׃ <WH4688> in the deep ׆
וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> For he commandeth וַֽ֭יַּעֲמֵד <WH5975> and raiseth ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> wind סְעָרָ֑ה <WH5591> the stormy וַתְּרוֹמֵ֥ם <WH7311> which lifteth up גַּלָּֽיו׃ <WH1530> the waves ׆

יַעֲל֣וּ <WH5927> They mount up שָׁ֭מַיִם <WH8064> to the heaven יֵרְד֣וּ <WH3381> they go down תְהוֹמ֑וֹת <WH8415> again to the depths נַ֝פְשָׁ֗ם <WH5315> their soul בְּרָעָ֥ה <WH7451> because of trouble תִתְמוֹגָֽג׃ <WH4127> is melted

יָח֣וֹגּוּ <WH2287> They reel to and fro וְ֭יָנוּעוּ <WH5128> and stagger כַּשִּׁכּ֑וֹר <WH7910> like a drunken man וְכָל־ <WH3605> and were at חָ֝כְמָתָ֗ם <WH2451> and are at their wits' תִּתְבַּלָּֽע׃ <WH1104> end

וַיִּצְעֲק֣וּ <WH6817> Then they cry אֶל־ <WH413> about יְ֭הוָה <WH3069> God בַּצַּ֣ר <WH6862> in their trouble לָהֶ֑ם <WH1992> out וּֽ֝מִמְּצֽוּקֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <WH4691> of their distresses יוֹצִיאֵֽם׃ <WH3318> and he bringeth them out
יָקֵ֣ם <WH6965> He maketh סְ֭עָרָה <WH5591> the storm לִדְמָמָ֑ה <WH1827> a calm וַ֝יֶּחֱשׁ֗וּ <WH2814> thereof are still גַּלֵּיהֶֽם׃ <WH1530> so that the waves

וַיִּשְׂמְח֥וּ <WH8055> Then are they glad כִֽי־ <WH3588> because יִשְׁתֹּ֑קוּ <WH8367> because they be quiet וַ֝יַּנְחֵ֗ם <WH5148> so he bringeth אֶל־ <WH413> about מְח֥וֹז <WH4231> haven חֶפְצָֽם׃ <WH2656> them unto their desired

יוֹד֣וּ <WH3034> Oh that [men] would praise לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD חַסְדּ֑וֹ <WH2617> [for] his goodness וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו <WH6381> and [for] his wonderful works לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> to the children אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> of men

וִֽ֭ירֹמְמוּהוּ <WH7311> Let them exalt בִּקְהַל־ <WH6951> him also in the congregation עָ֑ם <WH5971> of the people וּבְמוֹשַׁ֖ב <WH4186> him in the assembly זְקֵנִ֣ים <WH2205> of the elders יְהַלְלֽוּהוּ׃ <WH1984> and praise
יָשֵׂ֣ם <WH7760> He turneth נְהָר֣וֹת <WH5104> rivers לְמִדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> into a wilderness וּמֹצָ֥אֵי <WH4161> and springs מַ֝֗יִם <WH4325> of water לְצִמָּאֽוֹן׃ <WH6774> into dry ground
אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> land פְּ֭רִי <WH6529> A fruitful לִמְלֵחָ֑ה <WH4420> into barrenness מֵ֝רָעַ֗ת <WH7451> for the wickedness יֹ֣שְׁבֵי <WH3427> of them that dwell בָֽהּ׃

יָשֵׂ֣ם <WH7760> He turneth מִ֭דְבָּר <WH4057> the wilderness לַֽאֲגַם־ <WH98> into a standing מַ֑יִם <WH4325> water וְאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> ground צִ֝יָּ֗ה <WH6723> and dry לְמֹצָ֥אֵי <WH4161> springs מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> of water

וַיּ֣וֹשֶׁב <WH3427> to dwell שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> and there רְעֵבִ֑ים <WH7457> And there he maketh the hungry וַ֝יְכוֹנְנ֗וּ <WH3559> that they may prepare עִ֣יר <WH5892> a city מוֹשָֽׁב׃ <WH4186> for habitation

וַיִּזְרְע֣וּ <WH2232> And sow שָׂ֭דוֹת <WH7704> the fields וַיִּטְּע֣וּ <WH5193> and plant כְרָמִ֑ים <WH3754> vineyards וַ֝יַּעֲשׂ֗וּ <WH6213> which may yield פְּרִ֣י <WH6529> fruits תְבֽוּאָה׃ <WH8393> of increase

וַיְבָרֲכֵ֣ם <WH1288> He blesseth וַיִּרְבּ֣וּ <WH7235> them also so that they are multiplied מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> greatly וּ֝בְהֶמְתָּ֗ם <WH929> not their cattle לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יַמְעִֽיט׃ <WH4591> to decrease
וַיִּמְעֲט֥וּ <WH4591> Again they are minished וַיָּשֹׁ֑חוּ <WH7817> and brought low מֵעֹ֖צֶר <WH6115> through oppression רָעָ֣ה <WH7451> affliction וְיָגֽוֹן׃ <WH3015> and sorrow ׆

שֹׁפֵ֣ךְ <WH8210> He poureth בּ֭וּז <WH937> contempt עַל־ <WH5921> upon נְדִיבִ֑ים <WH5081> upon princes וַ֝יַּתְעֵ֗ם <WH8582> and causeth them to wander בְּתֹ֣הוּ <WH8414> in the wilderness לֹא־ <WH3808> no דָֽרֶךְ׃ <WH1870> [where there is] no way

וַיְשַׂגֵּ֣ב <WH7682> on high אֶבְי֣וֹן <WH34> Yet setteth he the poor מֵע֑וֹנִי <WH6040> from affliction וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <WH7760> and maketh כַּ֝צֹּ֗אן <WH6629> like a flock מִשְׁפָּחֽוֹת׃ <WH4940> [him] families

יִרְא֣וּ <WH7200> shall see יְשָׁרִ֣ים <WH3477> The righteous וְיִשְׂמָ֑חוּ <WH8055> [it] and rejoice וְכָל־ <WH3605> all עַ֝וְלָ֗ה <WH5766> and all iniquity קָ֣פְצָה <WH7092> shall stop פִּֽיהָ׃ <WH6310> her mouth

מִי־ <WH4310> Who חָכָ֥ם <WH2450> Whoso [is] wise וְיִשְׁמָר־ <WH8104> and will observe אֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> to these וְ֝יִתְבּֽוֹנְנ֗וּ <WH995> these [things] even they shall understand חַֽסְדֵ֥י <WH2617> the lovingkindness יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD
